roleset.name: acquire exclusive rights to printed material
roleset.note: COPYRIGHT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'copyright' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from copyright.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: adjectival
example.text: That finding, the report says, casts doubt on the record industry's contention that the new generation of digital recording equipment will inevitably lead to wholesale abuse of copyrighted material by home tapers.
